decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Proposed Elevations (ref. DR-A-30001 Rev A); Proposed Section & Elevation (ref. DR-A-20001 Rev A); Proposed Floor Plans (ref. DR-A-10001 Rev A); Proposed Location Plan (ref. DR-A-0100 Rev A); Proposed Site Plan (ref. Dr-A-10000 Rev A).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012 | The outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1, and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021).'
description: Single storey side/rear (wrap around) extension; construction of detached rear outbuilding (use as garage/office); following the demolition of rear garage; alteration to raised rear terrace
